original_text: Then Saul went up from pursuing the Philistines, and the Philistines went to their own place.
korean_text: 사울이 블레셋 사람들 추격하기를 그치고 올라가매 블레셋 사람들이 자기 곳으로 돌아가니라

sentences.original_text: Then Saul went up from pursuing the Philistines
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 사울은 블레셋 사람을 추격하는 것을 멈추고

sentences.original_text: the Philistines went to their own place
